articles.description: Antonio Conte reportedly reinforced his aim to get the standards up at Tottenham by ordering training after the postponement of Sunday's clash with Burnley.
articles.content:
Antonio Conte reportedly reinforced his mission to get the standards up at Tottenham by ordering a training session straight after the postponement of Sunday’s clash with Burnley.

articles.author: CNN staff
articles.title: Ex-footballer Mohamed Aboutrika calls homosexuality a 'dangerous ideology' against the backdrop of the Premier League's Rainbow Laces campaign - CNN
articles.description: Former Egypt international Mohamed Aboutrika has described homosexuality as a "dangerous ideology" amid an English Premier League initiative championing LGBTQ+ inclusion.

articles.description: It can now be revealed that the man who helped Louise Speed to heal her heartbreak after the death of Wales football manager Gary is businessman Quinton Bird, 52, a divorced father-of-three.
articles.content:
